body_html: Hi @mklebanamc, we are really sorry to hear that. The wide deep model used to clear out the directory set by the --model_dir flag, to allow training to start from a blank slate. We recently pushed out a change to clear the directory only when the user has specified a --clean flag. In general, Estimator expects free reign over the model directory. Again, sincere apologies that this happened.

body: Hi @mklebanamc, we are really sorry to hear that. The wide deep model used to clear out the directory set by the `--model_dir` flag, to allow training to start from a blank slate. We recently pushed out a change to clear the directory only when the user has specified a `--clean` flag. In general, Estimator expects free reign over the model directory. Again, sincere apologies that this happened.
